    • Method Detail

      • doCreate

        protected Ability doCreate()
        Description copied from class: EffectDefinition
        Creates a new instance of the effect based on this definition. Any additional configured parameters may be set to fully configure the returned event.

        Note that certain properties (such as effectName and player will be set by the wrapper method #create(EntityPlayer) and do not need to be set here.

        Specified by:
        doCreate in class AbilityDefinition
        Returns:
        a configured Effect instance
